title: Amefurasshi
text:
Amefurasshi (stylized as AMEFURASSHI) is a Japanese girl idol group managed by Stardust Promotion. AMEFURASSHI forms STARDUST PLANET along with groups such as Momoiro Clover Z, Shiritsu Ebisu Chugaku, and Chō Tokimeki Sendenbu.
It was formed in 2018 with five members, the 5 were former members of 3B Junior.
The group debuted on November 3, 2018 with their first performance being at the "Cell Division" festival. The graduation festival of the trainee group 3B Junior.
The group name was changed from アメフラっシ(Amefurasshi)  to AMEFURASSHI on November 19, 2021.


== Members ==
All members are from Tokyo.
